mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION (user_id, reservation_name, email, tel, venue_id, venue_name, status, reserve_date, reserve_start_time, reserve_end_time, total_price) values (#{user.id}, #{reservation_name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{venue.id}, #{venue.venue_name}, #{status}, #{reserve_date}, #{reserve_start_time}, #{reserve_end_time}, #{total_price})
mapper.select: select re.id "re_id", re.reservation_name "re_reservation_name", re.email "re_email", re.tel "re_tel", re.reserve_date "re_reserve_date", re.reserve_start_time "re_reserve_start_time", re.reserve_end_time "re_reserve_end_time", re.total_price "re_total_price", re.status "re_status", u.id "u_id", u.name "u_name", u.username "u_username", u.tel "u_tel", v.id "v_id", v.venue_name "v_venue_name", v.address "v_address", v.limit_num "v_limit_num", v.venue_category "v_venue_category", v.info_tel "v_info_tel", v.price "v_price", v.posible_start_date "v_posible_start_date", v.posible_end_date "v_posible_end_date", v.open_time "v_open_time", v.close_time "v_close_time" from RESERVATION re join user u on re.user_id = u.id join venue v on re.venue_id = v.id where re.venue_id = #{venue_id} and re.reserve_date = #{reserve_date};

select re.id "re_id", re.reservation_name "re_reservation_name", re.email "re_email", re.tel "re_tel", re.reserve_date "re_reserve_date", re.reserve_start_time "re_reserve_start_time", re.reserve_end_time "re_reserve_end_time", re.total_price "re_total_price", re.status "re_status", re.paydate "re_paydate", u.id "u_id", u.name "u_name", u.username "u_username", u.tel "u_tel", v.id "v_id", v.venue_name "v_venue_name", v.price "v_price" from RESERVATION re join user u on re.user_id = u.id join venue v on re.venue_id = v.id where re.user_id = #{userId}
